# GAIK Toolkit API Dependencies
# Uses gaik[all] which includes all building blocks

# GAIK toolkit with all extras (transcriber, parser, extractor)
# Install from project root: pip install -e ".[all]"
# Or from PyPI when published: gaik[all]

# FastAPI and ASGI
fastapi>=0.128.0
uvicorn[standard]>=0.40.0

# File upload handling
python-multipart>=0.0.21

# Configuration
pydantic-settings>=2.12.0
